name: HENTAI SHADOW
description: Beautiful girls in anime style, challenging puzzles with good soothing music - all these are waiting for you in this game.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Processor: Intel Celeron 2.6 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 11 compatible DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1000 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX 11 compatible
